mapper.select: SELECT j.J_NO,j.J_TITLE,j.J_CONTENT,j.J_DEADLINE,j.M_ID,j.J_PAYMENT,j.J_SALARY,j.J_DELETED,j.J_JOINNO,j.J_GENDER,j.J_AGE,j.J_EDUCATION,j.J_CAREER,ja.ja_savedfilename,j.M_NAME,j.J_EMAIL,j.J_PHONE FROM JOBBOARD j LEFT OUTER JOIN JOBBOARDATTACHMENT ja ON j.j_no = ja.j_no where j.j_no = #{jobboardNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT IFNULL( MAX(J_NO), 0) + 1 from jobboard
INSERT INTO JOBBOARD (j_no, j_title, j_content, j_deadline, j_joinno, j_gender, j_age, j_education, m_id, j_payment, j_salary, j_career, m_name, j_tag ,j_email,j_phone) VALUES (#{jobboardNo},#{jobboardTitle}, #{jobboardContent},#{jobboardDeadLine},#{jobboardJoinNo},#{jobboardGender},#{jobboardAge},#{jobboardEducation},#{memberId},#{jobboardPayment},#{jobboardSalary},#{jobboardCareer},#{memberName}, #{categoryTag},#{jobboardemail},#{jobboardPhone})

insert into jobboardattachment (ja_no, j_no, ja_savedfilename, ja_filename) values (#{jobboardAttachmentNo}, #{jobboardNo}, #{savedFileName}, #{userFileName})
